subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Amid the usual “next year will be better” chatter, the Rangers are grateful there will be a next year for Mats Zuccarello, who was lost after being struck by a shot early in the playoffs.
snippet: Amid the usual “next year will be better” chatter, the Rangers are grateful there will be a next year for Mats Zuccarello, who was lost after being struck by a shot early in the playoffs.
